    • Method Detail

      • getArtifact

        public File getArtifact(String url,
               String md5,
               String sha1)
                 throws Exception
        Get a File in the download cache. If no cache for this URL, or if expected signatures don't match cached ones, returns null. available in cache,
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the file
        md5 - MD5 signature to verify file. Can be null => No check
        sha1 - Sha1 signature to verify file. Can be null => No check
        Returns:
        A File when cache is found, null if no available cache
        Throws:
        Exception

      • install

        public void install(String url,
           File outputFile,
           String md5,
           String sha1)
             throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception
